attributes.action: Ban the Sale of Fireworks to the Public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So many people die and cause serious injury to themselves and others each year. Why do we have these highly explosive materials on sale to the public? It is madness. What is wrong with going to your local display for some safe fun?
Help put a stop to this danger by signing this petition which will hopefully assist the banning of fireworks nationally.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
